summary.span: 使用自定义文本布局客户端提供用于为文本设置格式及断开文本行的服务。

span.span: Provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines using a custom text layout client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]是文本引擎, 提供用于设置文本格式和断开文本线条的服务。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] text engine that provides services for formatting text and breaking text lines. 可以处理不同的文本字符格式和段落样式, 并支持国际文本布局。 can handle different text character formats and paragraph styles, and includes support for international text layout. 与传统文本[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]不同 , 通过一组回调方法与文本布局客户端交互。Unlike a traditional text [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], the interacts with a text layout client through a set of callback methods. 它要求客户端在类的实现中提供这些方法。It requires the client to provide these methods in an implementation of the class. 下图说明了文本格式化程序客户端和文本布局客户端的交互。The following diagram illustrates the interaction of the text formatter client and the text layout client. ![文本布局客户端和 system.windows.media.textformatting.textformatter> 的关系图](~/add/media/textformatter01.png "文本布局客户端和 system.windows.media.textformatting.textformatter> 的关系图")![Diagram of text layout client and TextFormatter](~/add/media/textformatter01.png "Diagram of text layout client and TextFormatter") 文本布局客户端与 System.windows.media.textformatting.textformatter> 对象之间的交互Interaction between the text layout client and the TextFormatter object ## 文本格式设置服务Text Formatting Services 提供对文本功能 (如 OpenType 版式) 的支持, 以及对文本运行、线条和段落级别功能的支持。 provides support for text features, such as OpenType typography, as well as support for text run, line, and paragraph level features. 下表列出了支持文本功能的主要支持服务。The following table is a list of the key supported services for text features. |功能Feature|说明Description|
